website_summaries.verdict: This fountain works well, is easy to install, and has simple lines that will fit into many outdoor settings.
pros: Fairly lightweight enough to be easily be moved and placed by most people
Comes with lighting for nighttime enjoyment
Solid and easy to set up
Pump has good pressure and provides a steady water flow
Holds the water well without splashing onto surrounding patio or deck areas
cons: Advertised as made from stone, but it is actually made from a composite product called Envirostone for the look of real stone without the weight

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but expect to constantly refill.
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is beautiful, dont get me wrong. The water is loud, I like the sound of water and this may even be overwhelming lol. The reason I give 3 stars is that if your fountain is only 2 inches down, you will need to refill. So, weve had it running 3 days AND have our dripline hooked into it so it fills when the flowers get watered (good tip for anyone that didnt already do this) and it still has needed about a gallon of water a day. We are going to try to reconfigure the pump so it sits lower but as is, expect to refill it every day.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Received replacement and resin paint chipped again and paint faded over 4month period 6/2018-10/2018
customer_reviews.text: 10/2018 -Received replacement and resin paint chipped again. (10/2017-4th request -for a replacement or refund. Product is not durableand paint is chipping.( purchased 9/2016 had a brief run and stored it for winter indoors in 10/2016- Just put it out for use 6/2017 season and filled with untreated hose water and noticed all the paint is chipping in each tier showing white now. Totally unsightly)...contacted Asurion and they said Im still under manufacturer warranty and they gave me a number to call Smart Living 1-800-345-4762. I called them and they said they just distribute product not manufacture. I need a replacement fountain from someone because the paint chipping is getting word.!
customer_reviews.author: Ann R.

customer_reviews.title: Cool fountain but..... Leaked everywhere. Hoping for redemption. UPDATE- DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Love this fountain! Purchased for my back pool patio and it is perfect. Easy to put together and everything worked. Nice product for the money. Update: the fountain is leaking all over my patio. What a mess. Requested a replacement from Amazon and am dreading packing the return. Praying no issues this time. UPDATE: Second fountain delivered. Optimistically unpacked and set it up only to find...you guessed it! It is also leaking- all over my patio. Beyond annoyed. 2 fountains, hours of unpacking, setting up, cleaning up, dismantling and repacking and NO FOUNTAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Sillystuff

customer_reviews.title: ... alittle shorter than I had hoped but it is beautiful and the noise is great
customer_reviews.text: ITs alittle shorter than I had hoped but it is beautiful and the noise is great! Easy set up and leveling it was not a problem at all. There is not water spill so I don’t have to refil. Great buy and would recommend to anyone Update: after having it set up for a couple months. Paint is chipping really bad. Makes me sad
customer_reviews.author: kjuch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition !
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to our back yard. Strong water sound, and even though it is lite in weight, it does not look cheap! Safe option for toddlers who play in the back yard ! Love the earthy brown color !
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Caution : bowls are crooked
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described and on time. Tiers all manufactured crooked and they do not lock in place tightly. Results in uneven flow of water.
customer_reviews.author: britney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected... Perfect flow, sound and look for my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Mantodea

customer_reviews.title: Soothing sounds, great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want something concrete and massively heavy. This was substantial enough not to be concerned about being blown about by weather, but maneuverable for one person. Went together easily. I bought led lights to go in the water for after dark and everything has turned out beautifully!! I may add to this after a period of time when I see how it lasts, but for now, sitting on my patio morning and evening, with the wonderful water sounds and the soft lighting, it was a wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like someone tried to repair
customer_reviews.text: Bottom tier had 3" large crack and chip in top edge that went into water area. Looks like someone tried to repair, but it didn't make it through shipment. Also, the color is much lighter than the picture. Almost a light tan. Overall quality didn't look good as their also was areas all over that looked like someone wiped something yellowish that looks like wood glue all over each edge. Sorry. Just didn't earn my thumbs up. Sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jason/Bethlehem, PA

customer_reviews.title: Loks great, Great value & does not need to be be refilled every other day.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th fountain in this spot in 17 years. Two I got rid of because they needed to be filled too often. The third one was similar to this one (different manufacturer). The bottom cracked so it started leaking. To avoid future cracked bottom problems I placed this on on a level surface with a piece of play room foam underneath. This fountain holds a lot of water & does not splash it out. I really like it & think it will last years. Two things I do not like - the led lights stay on 24 7 & the foam packaging it came in crumbled at touch making a huge mess that was difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Senior McCOllam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, but sprung a leak in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: My last fountain made it 5 years before deteriorating. Exact model as this one. I’ve had new fountain a little less a month, and bottom of fountain is leaking. I threw out box as it works great, minus the leak. I write this as a warning. Any imperfections or lack of strength in fiberglass on sides or bottom, return. Keep the box! For a month. Requested replacement. It was cracked down side. Sent back. Requested refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: 'mirage in the desert' poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking fountain but cheaply made and over priced. Painted exterior surface began to flake off in first week. "Envirostone" material just like light weight hard plastic. Pump unit seem to be ok, led light in water stream is a joke. Paid 140+ dollars from Amazon third party supplier, wouldn't be worth much more than 40 dollars. Will never buy again without being able to touch-feel-examine.
customer_reviews.author: Blownaway

customer_reviews.title: looks great in my garden
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i can somewhat complain about is In very hot summer weather (where I live 105) I need to add water once a day. But I don't mind I also put a solar rock light pointing towards it at night it's so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Dedeaux

customer_reviews.title: Grand Aria Fountain
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this fountain. I will look perfect in my back yard in the new landscaped garden. Only problem was the first one that I received was broken. There was no damage to the box but the fountain was in pieces. So if you order this fountain be sure it is not broken when it arrives. other than that I really like the fountain so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keiser

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered yesterday and we set it up this afternoon. It was pretty easy to set up and works great! The hardest part was leveling the ground. It is a little smaller than I’d hoped but is true to the measurements listed. It’s light enough that one person can put it together and sturdy enough that I don’t think our dog will be able to knock it over. I love that it sounds like our backyard has a little creek running through it now! We’re very happy with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fountain! I ordered it to go in a flower bed in my front yard. I really like the look and feel of the fountain. The only complaint that I have is that it is bad about splashing the water out and you pretty much have to add water daily to keep it going. You can't beat the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: gulfmallards

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this fountain!
customer_reviews.text: The value you get with this fountain is crazy! It literally looks like $300-$400 fountains in stores. It's beautiful, the lights are very bright and the color (tan) works well up close to your house or garden area. These pictures capture just a slice of how beautiful this fountain is! BTW, we've had a variety of different fountains over the last 20 years and this one is by far my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Santa_Cruz_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I learned that occurs when the filters in each waterfall get dirty, causing the water to splash onto the upright ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Some reviews stated that the water leaks down. I learned that occurs when the filters in each waterfall get dirty, causing the water to splash onto the upright sections behind them then runs off to the sides on the narrow shelves. Keeping the filters cleaned out helps, as well as putting a small glob of clear caulk at the ends of the narrow shelves to force any drips to run back into the reservoirs.
customer_reviews.author: UPS guy

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know does anyone else have a problem with this fountain? We returned the first one because there was an apparent leak, the replacement looses water daily but is not obvious where the leak is. I dont understand how two of the products are both faulty. Will try to reach out to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Logs

customer_reviews.title: One of the very best fountains
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fountain that would add some nice water flowing sounds on my back patio that also creates an ambiance at night this fit the bill perfectly. Price was reasonable and it really added fun to my back yard! I have a number of fountains this one is my favorite. Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR INDOORS!
customer_reviews.text: . Not for indoors, nothing zen about it. I have found that you need to put rocks in it, you need to put it on the slowest speed, you need to tip it back a little, you need a bathmat under it and it still splashes on the floor. I don't recommend for an inside fountain. it's a hot mess.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B Gross

customer_reviews.title: The showplace fountain!
customer_reviews.text: First is the weight. This fountain replaced a concrete one that required a neighbor and myself to move for winter storage. This one I can handle by myself. The volume is ideal because I had a tee placed in one of the nearby lawn sprinkler heads. The quarter inch line goes up the leg of a tall flat metal crane with it's nose in the fountain. We control the flow rate by selecting the time it takes to fill two inches into the fountain each day at five am automatically. The fountain is in the sun light all day, thus high evaporation. TThe fountain is located in a rock garden near our house. We have had numerous positive comments.
customer_reviews.author: william h milne

customer_reviews.title: Love this Fountain
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is beautifully crafted and the sound Is amazing. I can hear it through most of the house when I have my windows cracked open. What a find!
customer_reviews.author: Renee N.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: We've had this fountain less than 5 months. We've already had to replace the pump and now the fountain itself is starting to loose its paint and is developing large horizontal cracks in multiple place up and down the sides. (In Text from May through September, so no freezing problem.)
customer_reviews.author: Whaledad

customer_reviews.title: splish splash I was taken a bath
customer_reviews.text: My old fountain wore out years ago and I have always wanted a new one. This is perfect. It is not as heavy as my old one, but than I and older and not as strong as I used to be. I did use a dolly to move it. I saved the plastic that came over it and now it stored in my garage for the winter. I do wish the lights were in colors. It is easy to fill and the splash can be adjusted. I did get one of those boxes to put the wires in. It looks nicer that way.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie dean

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at so many water fountains and really loved this with the water cascading from one flower to the other and the large vase it’s perfect decor and sound I have wanted to have on my back patio. I didn’t want a small table top but I didn’t want to pay much more than $200 and finding this at such a great price was amazing. I hope it lasts for years to come. It’s a little light weight but doesn’t splash and sound is tranquil. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best Fountain I've Ever Purchased on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: PRO: Powerful pump results in great water flow and sound, even at 50%; beautiful lighting at night; completely leakproof. CON: Bulky packaging in LOTS of crumbly Styrofoam made it somewhat difficult to unpack, although it did serve its purpose in ensuring the fountain arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: flightwriter

customer_reviews.title: broken.....(inside individual plastic bag)...no indication on exterior of box.
customer_reviews.text: The fountain arrived quickly. Unfortunately a key piece was broken. There are no instructions for assembly and it does NOT come with pump. Similar fountains at another source are not only less expensive but include pump. This fountain was to be the centerpiece of my new garden.... now starting a new search. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, easy set up...so nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought on amazon..and right after I purchased they raised it almost a hundred bucks.. so I feel blessed to have been able to get it at the price I did.. Really great.. lovely peaceful sound.. seems well made.. already basically set up except lights and pump.. very easy.. They only small small small thing.. I wish they would have put a light in the top container.. I don't know why they didn't.. It would have been more balanced and perfect!!.. TOO BAD.. But really a lovely fountain..and no complaints..
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: PEELING PAINT AFTER A FEW MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW - I had given 5 stars but now am at 1 star because the paint is peeling off all over this fountain! I am so disappointed because it looked beautiful, sounds lovely and the style is just perfect, plus the price is right! I hate that I'm going to have to find a way to get the rest of the paint off, find a way to prime it and repaint it. Really REALLY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first!  Not so happy now!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fountain in May of 2020. It was a great fountain but even with a drip system in it I have to fill it about every other day. Now the lights work but the pump does not. I’ve cleaned the fountain and pump and nothing. Very frustrating to pay so much and have it not work 4 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Mary f

customer_reviews.title: The fountain was the perfect size and works well
customer_reviews.text: The fountain was the perfect size and works well. However, it's built completely crooked, so you have to shim each level even though it sits on a level surface. Very disappointing. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Fidel Farm

customer_reviews.title: I like this but I bought it for indoors and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this but I bought it for indoors and it is VERY LOUD, too loud for my 900 sq ft condo. Here is the sound: Someone relentlessly pouring water from a paint can 8 feet high into another paint can below... I am going to store for when I move into a house one day. It truly belongs outside or in a building as large as a hotel, with lots of traffic and other noises. And, yes, NO COPPER! That is missing! BOOOO! It will be great outside and maybe I can fashion my own copper spouts with some copper sheeting.
customer_reviews.author: eveesmom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, helps a lot with distant traffic noise Easy to assemble- relaxing to have in the yard!
customer_reviews.author: michael benda

customer_reviews.title: If you are placing it where there won't be dirt or debris to get into the holes then it should be fine. I think this would work
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fountain for a few months now and the finish is completely coming off. It requires constant refilling and maintenance to keep debris out of the holes that recycle the water. If you are placing it where there won't be dirt or debris to get into the holes then it should be fine. I think this would work better in an indoor space. The sound is lovely and looks great until the finish/paint comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M Marrocco

customer_reviews.title: Nice fountain
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely fountain. Quick and very easy to unbox and assemble. Once going it has a nice sound - I would prefer for it to be a little louder but it’s definitely relaxing and I’m sure we will enjoy it all summer.
customer_reviews.author: L Messick

customer_reviews.title: Much water spills outside of fountain.
customer_reviews.text: Water spills out of the pot. The spill from the first pot hits the rim of the second pot and causes water to spill outside of the fountain. In addition, this fountain takes TWO plugs to be full functional. One plug for the pump, the second for the actual light. This can be resolved by splitting the pump power cord and attaching the cord for the light, but it takes someone who understands electricity to do so. Overall, I do NOT reccommend that you purchase this product based on the spillage of the water.
customer_reviews.author: BigBadBrad

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fountain for my husband when he decided to give the backyard a theme. I wasn't to sure about it. I was wrong! This fountain is SO cute. It looks terrific when it's lit up. We had a fountain before but we were disappointed because there was very little water sound. This is not a problem with this fountain! We love sitting outside and hearing the great sound this little fountain makes. That's the other great feature about this fountain, it's not too big. It is too perfect for smaller areas and gives you a big fountain sound. Everyone who has seen it LOVES it to. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Worrell

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I ordered this beautiful fountain...But so disappointed when it came!!!! The package was all torn apart and the fountain was all broken in pieces(the entire top bowl) The material was not well made. For $200 it was NOT worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: charles morrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our mom for her birthday, she loves it. It set up nice and quickly. Just now doing the review we actually got it back in December. Still running great, living in Florida you have to make sure to keep it full of water the birds love it. Arrived perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kevin wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Just set it up today. As you can see, I added some plants around it to add to the look. Easy set-up. Be aware that there are two things to plug in - the pump and the lights - so you will need two outlets. I have them both on separate timers, so I can run the fountain longer (day and night) and the lights will only come on after dark. (Timers are not included.) I have the water on maximum, and there is no problems. Nice touch to our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S.

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for function, not so much aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of birdbaths in my front and back yards. For outside my fence, I need something pretty large because sometimes deer come drink out of it. I had a ceramic birdbath there, but in the winter it cracked from freezing so I learned I need fiberglass for weather extremes. The paint is chipping off already, without any scrubbing, just water pressure, so it is quickly losing it's aesthetic appeal, but I'm interest in other aspects so I don't mind paint chipping off. It will be completely white in no time.
customer_reviews.author: L Wagers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sounds Zen Fountain
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect fountain for a bedroom balcony which is not huge. The fact that this fountain is tall and thin works great. There is definitely a water sound, in fact it was echoing off the walls and I added lots of plants around it and some river rocks in each bowl to soften it a bit . I could hear it from the ground and my condo is on the 5th floor. Excellent fountain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: VA ShopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pump stopped working after 5 months, no warranty service
customer_reviews.text: The fountain looks pretty when it's working. My model is Y98881. However, the pump died in 5 months. I went to manufacture's website and submitted the warranty service request. NO responses except acknowledgement of the request. I replaced the pump by myself and it's working again. 3 stars for so so quality, but 1 star for missing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: P.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Birdbath.
customer_reviews.text: The birdbath has a beautiful design, but just as someone else mentioned, it does have little white specks all over it where it seems the paint didn't adhere. This is the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. They won't show from afar, but I might decide to spray paint it at season's end anyway. It just seems as if it would have benefited from an additional coat of paint at the manufacturing level. I purchased it with a gift card, so I didn't mind the cost, but if it doesn't hold up well (which is my main concern), it will be replaced with a concrete birdbath.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love this fountain! It looks beautiful, especially in the dark. The sound is so peaceful. It is exactly the aura that my porch needed.
customer_reviews.author: Timerra R. Sankey

customer_reviews.title: Not durable- mine fell apart after less than 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: This fountain was beautiful and I liked the large bottom (it could hold lots of water so I didn't have to frequently fill). However, the paint peeled off after 3 months. Then the fiberglass started falling apart on the bottom of the fountain. It started to look like the Leaning Tower of Pisa. This fountain lasted less than 18 months. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Genia Burry

customer_reviews.title: the paint easily flakes off the entire product so I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the fountain outside in full sun all summer. But as others have experienced, the paint easily flakes off the entire product so I had to sand and repaint in areas to match. The pump often ran 24/7 and still is working fine. If you do not want it to splash much, be sure to turn down the flow control on the pump. Love the sound it creates.
customer_reviews.author: Oni

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Came already assembled. Phew! Solid heavy. Very good water flow so don't need to refill every day.
customer_reviews.author: Suze K

customer_reviews.title: Great bird fountain
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape without cracks or breaks. Was easy to assemble with good picture instructions and pump runs well with a small dial to reduce the flow rate and splashing. Birds love it already.
customer_reviews.author: J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: It's OK.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looking and we like the size. I would have given it 4 or 5 stars except for two things: it was pretty difficult to assemble, not helped by inadequate printed directions; and the motor is much louder than we've experienced with other such fountains.
customer_reviews.author: J. T.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fountain!
customer_reviews.text: This meets all my expectations. Simple to set up, looks and feels substantial, nice look and sound!
customer_reviews.author: Regan E

customer_reviews.title: but I tested it inside and it works beautifully. I'm going to take the advice of others ...
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is just what I hoped it would be. Weather is still too cold to use it outside, but I tested it inside and it works beautifully. I'm going to take the advice of others who suggested painting the spouts to give it a bit more pizzazz, but it is lovely in its natural state.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fountain is brittle after just one year of use.
customer_reviews.text: It is cracking and broken. So much so that I cannot use it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hetu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble, Looks Great, Soothing Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Although the box was a bit damaged (busted up in places), all of the fountain pieces arrived in great order. We put it together easily and the pump worked immediately. The sound of he fountain is perfect! Make sure it is level. There are a few spots in the middle basin where the brown paint cane off but it’s not where anyone can see it. We are so excited and hope that birds enjoy it too!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Tew

customer_reviews.title: 5 star rating
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this fountain. Have had it 3 days now with no leaks. It is much sturdier than I expected. Great addition to my patio
customer_reviews.author: S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Birds
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound of the water and my backyard birds love getting drinks from it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Montague

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, sounds good, works great
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! It was a little difficult to assemble but looks great, sounds great and we don't have to re-fill it constantly. Perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Navarrete-Hull

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Mother's Day. It looks great and the birds also love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good value but slashed water lot. Paint wears off in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Miller

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Better then expected, however I don’t like that it has two plugs, one for the light one for the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This fountains was really easy for me to set up. The water flow is beautiful and sounds so relaxing. I added the greenery at the top to blend with the rest of my patio. I’ve only had it three weeks but so far is was an excellent purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Peace and Tranquility
customer_reviews.text: Love this fountain...Easy to set up and light enough to bring in in the winter after I drained it. Offer a great soothing background sound on my deck!
customer_reviews.author: Scott.

customer_reviews.title: Why we returned the water feature!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved the water feature and the reason that we returned it was that it leaked out all of the water every night, not only was that A problem but the back deck was always wet!! We ordered another just like it from another, also through Amazon and we hope that it will be perfect and it was $100 less as a surprise 😊!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect love every aspect of this fountain! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Booth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fountain!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking fountain - easy to put together (less than 10 minutes), and makes a nice sound with the water flowing. Very little water splashes out. Looking at it, you wouldn't know it was made of fiberglass and not stone or concrete. These light weight fountains are so much easier to work with than the concrete ones because they weigh so much less. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SunnyNewBrunswick

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after one week
customer_reviews.text: The fountain worked very well for a week, and a fill of water lasted several days. Then we had to fill it every day. Then it would empty within hours. Wish we could exchange it for another.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Winscher

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC WATER FOUNTAIN
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fountain in memory of my late husband. I love hearing the running water when the windows are open. My neighbors all enjoy hearing it too. So glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Loar

customer_reviews.title: Best fountain
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. It sounds really good and looks nice especially at night with the lights on it. I put the lights on a light sensitivy timer so I don't have to keep them on all the time or remember to go out and turn them on and off. It is good size so we can see it from inside and hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: it is lopsided like it melted in the summer heat
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Ok looks and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but cheaply made first one came in cracked from Amazon second came with a crack on top , the color is a little darker then it shows ....
customer_reviews.author: B Madere

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey
customer_reviews.text: It’s certainly as described......Smaller than I would have preferred....needs a bit of adjustment as most do for water to flow evenly.....However I find it to be not worth the price.Most frustrating is the fact that after 2 inches of water is evaporated is stop flowing as pump sits to high in bottom trough
customer_reviews.author: Iron Lion

customer_reviews.title: I hate that this product is not of good quality.............
customer_reviews.text: When I got this fountain set up, I LOVED it! I liked the look, the sound, and it was an easy set up, BUT...........1 month, and 1 week later, the faux finish started pealing off in several places, and it's getting worse. So I looked up the return policy, and , go figure, you can return up to 1 month. this is very unfortunate. :(
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice little fountain
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Looks pretty realistic. I keep mine outside, and my nightly visitors seem to enjoy it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jones

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival- otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived broken and seems to be leaking from the bottom. On average I add water to it ever 8 hours or so because it becomes completely drained of water. Love the style of the fountain. Just wish it wasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous birdbath
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant, understated birdbath. It's shallow, just the way the birds like it. The designs on the sides and rim add to its elegance. It's lightweight and easy to put together. No problems with tipping so far! I have had this birdbath for about a month now. I got it to make my garden area look nicer for my son's graduation from high school. It arrived on time and did exactly what I wanted - it made the area look so much nicer! Now that the graduation has come and gone I am still enjoying it because it is beautiful to look at and fun to watch the birds playing in it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Daydream

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not very good constant needs refill pump lasted 1 month?
customer_reviews.author: no gland

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to set up, easy to carry/move, looks nice, sounds nice, does not splatter too much. The fiberglass base does not seem as strong as I was hoping, but time will tell how long it lasts. Since it is not lighted, I put rope lighting around it, and that looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ute K.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this fountain. It is beautiful and I get so many compliments about it. The water flows perfectly and the lights look great at night!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to our home. Nice and sturdy. We love it! Added a video for everyone to see it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my home-bound husband. He sits and watches the birds come to it for a drink and the smaller ones frolicking and bathing.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ann Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Using this in my office! Water sounds a little loud, but it is meant to be outdoors. Pump is a tiny hum and looks beautiful in my office! :D Shipped SUPER SUPER++++ FAST! Ordered it on Friday, expected it on Friday - but it arrived TUESDAY MORNING! :D Beautiful and perfect. I put little stones to cover the lights though - the LED's are kinda bright to look at once you step into the room. :) All in all, very pleased with this order and so happy I didn't buy a cheap $20 dollar fountain! :D
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Love this and am very satisfied so far. Still seems a bit pricey for the construction and I'm not sure about durability but only time will tell. As of right now, I'm pleased and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: This product does  not last very long a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was beautiful but started leaking water after 2 months of usage. I spoke with a Amazon agent and was told to send product back but was not told there would be a$55.87 restocking fee. Why should a restocking fee be applied when the fountain is damaged?
customer_reviews.author: Len Maith

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain is not designed to run on a timer
customer_reviews.text: Fountain is great but is NOT designed to run on a timer. From what the manufacturer told me, the timer (that is not from Bond nor recommended by them) shorts out the lights that should run for years. They sent me new lights as it was still under warranty but said the same thing will happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color fades off
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bird bath. I have had it in my back yard, but after a short time the color began coming off and now the inside is white and the rest of the bird bath is turning white. I suppose I will have to paint it, but was not expecting to have to do this. Just did not hold up as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: T Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the quality for the price. It's on my deck and fits perfect in a corner with a plug of course. Good size,super easy to connect, lights works well and the water flow is strong. Im sure you will enjoy it. I did buy the mosquito water tablets since I'm near a lot of woods. I will be storing it in the basement after the season. It does not look like it will handle NE weather.
customer_reviews.author: Annieb

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fountain
customer_reviews.text: The fountain is very nice looking for the price paid. There was a small crack & hole when it arrived but that was easy to fix. It assembled fast and is a good size, unlike others at this price. The pump is conveniently located so that it is possible to get to it to adjust the water flow without having to take out the water, etc. as with other fountains. The birds love it and we enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water feature
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It was so easy to assemble and looks beautiful. I’m waiting for mulch and flowers and landscaping to bloom to set the entire space.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor fountain
customer_reviews.text: This fountain was perfect for my landscaping and made my yard so beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Zen Fountain
customer_reviews.text: This Fountain arrived very quickly, it has great water sounds, was very easy to set up and start using. My only complaint is that there is no on off switch - to turn it on and off you have to plug in and unplug the pump cord.
customer_reviews.author: Hurtt Mom

customer_reviews.title: The hole in the right bottom vessel is an easy fill guide
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice water fountain! Arrived slightly damaged on one corner, but the fountain looks great, sounds great, minimal to no splashing. Nice led lights. Minimal setup.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Newman

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: save your money and buy one that is what it is supposed to be.Nothing but a mosquito magnet.junk
customer_reviews.author: Betty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it broke-would only buy concrete or cast iron in the future; however it is very decorative!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Love this fountain. Doesn't clog like many other styles. I bought a can of copper spray paint and painted the spouts before I ever set it up. Changes the appearance to what was advertised. Love it. Bought a timer for the lights.
customer_reviews.author: JackieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Nice fountain for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The water pump Motor was really hard to install into the fountain. I also, noticed the middle tier does not sit level. But, with that said-- I find the fountain very looking and relaxing to sit in front of. The price is good for what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: peggy feldmeier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed this for months now! Nice looking and well made!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to my patio!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It has met or exceeded my expectations. Water flow is perfect, lighting is exceptional and adds to the ambiance of my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D.

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is amazing, I'm ordering a nothing one for the backyard. Absolutely beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great piece. Everyone loves it including me and my wife.........sounds nice too. Ahhhhhhhh Cue the ENYA CD.
customer_reviews.author: blacque rob

product_meta.title: Bond Manufacturing Y98881 Ashboro 33 inch Zen Fountain
product_meta.description: Style:AshboroEnjoy countless hours of pure relaxation as you peacefully listen to three streams of water flow through the Ashboro Water Fountain. As the sun fades away, take pleasure in the yellow glow of light at each lower tier. The Ashboro has been skillfully crafted by our professional artisans, guaranteeing you a truly unique piece that will enhance your outdoor living area, while remaining durable through the elements.
feature_bullets: Great addition to your patio, balcony, or outdoor entertainment area

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
